title: The Jason Chaffetz Exit Interview
description: With 48 hours left in office, then-Rep. Jason Chaffetz (R-Utah) sat down with Chuck Todd to talk about his time in Congress, the cost that his family paid for his tenure in Washington, and why he was leaving when his party was in power.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
